wedo_instance.description: Final Realization: Wrapping OpenClaw in the Heartwood Legislative Substrate on AWS via Nitro Enclave.

meta.philosophy: Hardware is Law. Vercel is a toy; AWS TEE is a fortress. We anchor sovereignty in the Silicon.
meta.relay_note: Detailed instructions for 3-hour technical strike. Follow sequence to avoid substrate fracture.

tasks.description: INFRASTRUCTURE: Execute 'py/quicken.py' on the remote Floral Monster node (98.87.28.157) via './aws_strike.sh sync'. Mirror the clawed_monster substrate.
TECHNICAL: Instantiate the 'Silicon Notary' wrapper. Ensure OpenClaw STDIO is piped through the Heartwood forensic skills within the Nitro Enclave.
FORENSIC: Retrieve PCR (Platform Configuration Register) hashes from the Enclave. Update the HUD to display hardware-attested sovereignty.
ECONOMIC: Activate the x402 payment flow on the live AWS endpoint. Test the 402 Status code response from the public IP.
NARRATIVE: Record the 5-minute video at Frontier Tower (near Cheerbot). Show the transition from Social Cheer to Forensic Strike on the AWS TEE.
SUBMISSION: Post video to X (tag @lablabai @Surgexyz_), post build update to Moltbook, and finalize Lablab.ai dashboard.
